description: Amendments to planning permission dated 23rd November 2024 (RN:24/07446/FULL) for Variation of conditions 1 (approved plans), 4 (energy efficiency/bio diversity) and 10 (hard  soft landscaping and SUDS) of planning permission dated 27 June 2023 (RN: 23/00129/FULL) which itself varied condition 1 of planning permission dated 2nd November 2022 (RN:22/01575/FULL) for the External alterations and extensions to 2-3 Orme Court, amalgamation of 2 Orme Court and basement of 3 Orme Court with 1 and 4-8 Orme Court, internal reconfigurations and refurbishments to facilitate change of use to residential, religious and educational establishment for international community of professionals, students and priests, including en-suite private bedrooms, communal areas, work and study spaces, meeting rooms, library and ancillary spaces (Sui Generis), and mansard extension with associated internal reconfigurations to retained flats at 3 Orme Court (Class C3) from RN: 22/01575/FULL. Namely, to vary the entrance to 2 Orme Court to replace the approved stairs/lift block with a traversing lift to provide vertical access between floors.
